oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt 4 from oral history interview with Kenneth L. Roberts, 2006 July 27
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an oral history interview with Nashville business and civic leader Kenneth L. Roberts, conducted on 27 July 2006 by Cabot Pyle as part of the Nashville Public Library's Nashville Business Leaders Oral History Project: The Turner Interviews. Roberts discusses attending and teaching law school at Vanderbilt and joining the firm of Waller, Lansden & Dortch. He also discusses other law firms with offices in the American Trust Building, located on the corner of Third Avenue and Union Street. The complete interview, as well as an index, is available in the repository.
